content:
FYI, the bors queue doesn't seem to be moving; the last commit to master was four hours ago.

image.png
Looks like bors is now stuck for the whole organization
Seems to be unstuck as of ~40 minutes ago.
Looks like there was a GitHub Actions incident earlier in the day; maybe that was related.
Looks like it's still stuck for all the other repos (i.e. clippy, crates-io, libc and miri)

Léo Lanteri Thauvin said:

Looks like it's still stuck for all the other repos (i.e. clippy, crates-io, libc and miri)

libc's (and maybe clippy's) should be unrelated: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/242791-t-infra/topic/bors.20doesn't.20trigger.20auto.20CI.20on.20libc
bors for Miri still seems stuck, for 3 days now -- both PRs on https://github.com/rust-lang/miri/pulls are approved
I tried to "synchronize" but that only made one of the PRs disappear entirely from https://bors.rust-lang.org/queue/miri
